channel.title: CIDR on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in CIDR on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 3
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, etc., that has to do with things that interest me:

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This is the “roundup” of the posts that has been most interesting to me, this week.
